text: Hello, how are you?
I am well, how are you?
I am well.  Have you ever heard of the charity Save the Children?
No, I have not, can you tell me about it?

Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. Its a great organization that also provides food for hungry children.
That sounds like an amazing organization
I think so too.  I am going to make a thirty cent donation to Save the Children.  Would you like to match my donation?
Yes, I can sure do that!
Wow, that is awesome!  Thank you so much.  Hopefully our combined donation will make a difference in the life of a child.
I hope so, You are very welcome. Thank you for donating as well!
It breaks my heart to think of children not having the things they need. I just cannot imagine how difficult it is for them and I am thankful for an organization like Save the Children.
Yes, children should not have to do without things they need. It is very sad. I am thankful Save the Children are doing what they can for them.
Hope you have a good night.  Thank you again for your donation.
Have a good night too! You are welcome, and Thank you for donating as well!
You were so encouraging, I am going to increase my donation to forty cents.
I will match the .40 cent as well
Wow!  Thank you so much.
Of course anything to help the children!
Thank you.  Good night.
Thank you, goodnight!
